name: Dragon Ball: Shenron no Nazo
description: Dragon Ball: Shenron no Nazo (ドラゴンボール 神シェン龍ロンの謎なぞ Doragon Bōru Shenron no Nazo, lit. Dragon Ball: Shenlong’s Riddle) is the second video game based on the Dragon Ball series (its predecessor being Dragon Ball: Dragon Daihikyou) and the first Dragon Ball game produced and distributed by Bandai. It is an action game developed by TOSE Software Company. It was released for the Family Computer on November 27, 1986 in Japan. Outside Japan, a graphically altered version released for the North American market in March 1988 under the title of Dragon Power, which divorced the game from the Dragon Ball license. Shenron no Nazo consists of 2D overhead areas where Goku must fight many enemies, and switches to side-scrolling sequences for the boss fights.
